hero.title:
Premium Indonesian Ginger
for Global Markets
hero.subtitle: PT. Princess Jaya Abadi: Trusted partner for fresh and processed ginger exports—aromatic, hygienic, and consistent quality from Indonesia.

mission.label: Our Purpose
mission.heading: Bringing Indonesian Ginger to the World
mission.quote: To be the world’s leading exporter of ginger and its derivatives—committed to quality, sustainability, and empowering local farmers.
points: Supply premium ginger with international quality standards.
Ensure hygienic and sustainable post-harvest processing.
Deliver consistent quality with export-ready packaging.
Empower Indonesian ginger farmers through fair trade partnerships.

about.label: Why Choose Us?
about.heading: The Princess Jaya Abadi Advantage
about.description: We specialize in sourcing, processing, and exporting Indonesian ginger. With a focus on quality, food safety, and customer trust, we are a reliable partner for global buyers. Every batch is carefully cleaned, graded, tested, and packed to ensure freshness, consistency, and export compliance.

features.title: Trusted Sourcing
features.description: Ginger is sourced directly from Indonesia’s major farming regions, with full traceability back to the growers.

features.title: Consistent Quality
features.description: Graded for size, moisture, cleanliness, and uniform appearance according to buyer specifications.

features.title: Hygienic Processing
features.description: Post-harvest washing, slicing, and drying are done with food-grade equipment under strict SOPs.

features.title: Export Documentation
features.description: Phytosanitary certificates, COO, and detailed product specifications prepared for smooth customs clearance.

features.title: Reliable Partnerships
features.description: We maintain transparency, pre-shipment inspection, and after-sales support for long-term trust.

product.label: Our Ginger Products
product.heading: Fresh & Processed Ginger for Various Applications
product.description: We offer fresh ginger, dried slices, and ginger powder, suitable for retail, HORECA, food and beverage industries, and traditional medicine. Private labeling and custom specifications are available upon request.

items.title: Fresh Ginger
items.description: Aromatic and carefully cleaned with controlled moisture—ready for retail and industrial use.

items.title: Dried Sliced Ginger
items.description: Low-moisture uniform slices, perfect for tea, extraction, and spice blends.

items.title: Ginger Powder
items.description: Finely milled under hygienic conditions, ideal for beverages, bakery, and packaged foods.

quality.label: Our Commitment to Quality
quality.heading: Food Safety and Export Standards Guaranteed
quality.intro: At PT. Princess Jaya Abadi, quality is at the heart of our operations. From farm to packaging, every step follows strict SOPs to preserve aroma, flavor, and shelf life.
points: Fresh ginger sourced directly from trusted farmers.
Post-harvest processing with strict hygiene control.
Grading and sizing for consistency in every shipment.
Certified food safety standards and export documentation.
quality.conclusion: We ensure every shipment of ginger meets international requirements with reliable quality and authentic Indonesian aroma.

usp.heading: Why Partner with PT. Princess Jaya Abadi?

items.title: Export-Ready Packaging
items.description: Clean sacks with inner liners, cartons, or vacuum packs to preserve freshness and reduce shrinkage.

items.title: Strict Sorting
items.description: Careful washing, drying, and grading to meet global quality standards.

items.title: Reliable Logistics
items.description: Efficient supply chain and predictable shipping schedules to global destinations.

items.title: Community Empowerment
items.description: Supporting local ginger farmers with fair pricing and sustainable practices.

exportDestination.title: Global Reach of Our Ginger
exportDestination.regions: Asia, Europe, America, Middle East, Australia
exportDestination.paragraph1: Indonesian ginger is highly valued worldwide for its aroma and potency. PT. Princess Jaya Abadi exports to multiple continents with stable supply and export-ready quality.
exportDestination.paragraph2: Our strong logistics network ensures timely and efficient deliveries across Asia, Europe, America, the Middle East, and Australia.

news.label: Latest Updates
news.heading: News & Insights on the Ginger Industry
news.description: Stay updated with global ginger trends, product innovation, and PT. Princess Jaya Abadi’s export achievements.

team.label: Our Dedicated Team
team.heading: Experts Behind the Quality
team.description: Meet the professionals ensuring every shipment of ginger meets international standards and customer satisfaction.

location.label: Find Us Here
location.heading: Head Office & Production Hub
location.description: Our office and production hub is located in Lampung, Indonesia, close to major ginger farming areas—ensuring fresh supply and efficient export preparation.

cta.heading: Ready to Import Premium Indonesian Ginger?
cta.description: Connect with PT. Princess Jaya Abadi today. Whether you need fresh ginger, dried slices, or powder—we are ready to support your business with consistent supply and full export service.

footer.shippingDesc: Orders are packed in export-ready sacks, cartons, or vacuum-sealed packaging. Standard dispatch within 2–3 weeks after confirmation.
footer.deliveryDesc: Worldwide delivery through trusted freight forwarders with sea and air shipping options.
footer.returnsDesc: Please confirm product specifications before purchase. Due to the food nature of the product, returns are limited and subject to prior agreement.
footer.subscribeDesc: Subscribe for updates on ginger availability, pricing, and market insights.
footer.headline: Let’s Talk — Chat on WhatsApp
